trans-unit.source: This diagram illustrates <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> in a standalone configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_in_a_standalone_configuration" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>):

seg-source.mrk: This diagram illustrates <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> in a standalone configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_in_a_standalone_configuration" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: Ce schéma illustre <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> dans une configuration autonome (<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_in_a_standalone_configuration" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) :

trans-unit.source: A standalone configuration is composed of a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> standalone server, and several <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> tenants and agents.

seg-source.mrk: A standalone configuration is composed of a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> standalone server, and several <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> tenants and agents.

target.mrk: Une configuration autonome est composée d'un serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> autonome, et de plusieurs entités et agents <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>.

trans-unit.source: Stores protected data from the agents according to protection policies defined by the administrator and the user.

seg-source.mrk: Stores protected data from the agents according to protection policies defined by the administrator and the user.

target.mrk: Conserve les données protégées des agents , conformément aux politiques de protection définies par l'administrateur et l'utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: Relies on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> (ADE) to store all the unique data blocks sent by the agents. The ADE database keeps track of all the data blocks stored, and the repository where data is actually stored.

seg-source.mrk: Relies on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> (ADE) to store all the unique data blocks sent by the agents.
The ADE database keeps track of all the data blocks stored, and the repository where data is actually stored.

target.mrk: S'appuie sur l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> (ADE) pour stocker tous les blocs de données uniques envoyés par les agents.
La base de données ADE garde une trace de tous les blocs de données stockés et de l'espace de stockage où les données sont réellement stockées.
Détecte les données nouvelles et modifiées.

trans-unit.source: Applies the <MadCap:glossaryTerm glossTerm="Glossary-ALN.Term0" class="" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">protection policy</MadCap:glossaryTerm> set on the server side by the administrator and on the agent side by the user.

seg-source.mrk: Applies the <MadCap:glossaryTerm glossTerm="Glossary-ALN.Term0" class="" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">protection policy</MadCap:glossaryTerm> set on the server side by the administrator and on the agent side by the user.

target.mrk: Applique la <MadCap:glossaryTerm glossTerm="Glossary-ALN.Term0" class="" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">politique de protection</MadCap:glossaryTerm> définie du côté serveur par l'administrateur et du côté agent par l'utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: Sends unique blocks of protected data to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> Server, according to the protection policies.

seg-source.mrk: Sends unique blocks of protected data to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> Server, according to the protection policies.

target.mrk: Envoie des blocs uniques de données protégées au serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>, conformément aux politiques de protection.

trans-unit.source: Provides restore capability, through a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> or Windows Explorer.

seg-source.mrk: Provides restore capability, through a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> or Windows Explorer.

target.mrk: Fournit une capacité de restauration, via un <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> ou l'Explorateur Windows.
